abstractText: An incomplete copy of the Cāndravyākaraṇa by the Buddhist grammarian Candragomin, containing the sūtrapāṭha without any commentary. Previously, it had been wrongly identified as Śabdalakṣaṇa. The manuscript includes the pratyāhārasūtras and part of the first section of the first chapter up to rule 1.1.146, jvalādibhyo ṇo vā, and the beginning of the next rule.
